title: So how's that Noxus lore going Riot?

replies.body:
LeBlanc is so good at operating secretly that even Riot doesn't know what's going on in Noxus.

{{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
Oh thank goodness Draven got his snoring cured
{{champion:8}} too I want to see him use more advanced hemomancy spells (like burning blood inside the enemy's veins or some other crazy sh**).

so essentially blood bending (from ATLA if you don't know)?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Bloodbending can't do some things that blood magic can do. For example Vladimir can transform into a pool of blood.
I know, but manipulating blood in enemy's vein is straight up blood bending lol.
Well of course there will be similarities. It's a blood thing it's similar just how fire magic is similar in some ways to firebending.
Noxians... I hate these guys.
{{champion:240}}
When lore team keeps saying soon to Talon's lore update but it's been 8 months since the Noxus lore update :(
There are more important things to do than Lore updates, like BALANCE changes. We all know the same people do both HAHA
Thank you. Thank you. The year is ending and all we got was just Riven. It was supposed to continue thoroughout the year...
noxus legit just got a bunch of lore when swain came out.  there's other regions ya kno.

Are you aware that a particular Creative Development Producer claimed they might have more time for Noxus throughout the year.

Although as this year comes closer to it's end, I highly doubt we'll actually see any new Noxus releases.

gonna be honest that's just dumb. I'd love more zaun lore, but i'm aware the update was fairly recent (and also left some characters as is).

but there's stuff that needs to take priority rn, we need a break from targon/shurima/bilgewater related stuff for a while too for example, i wouldn't mind seeing more on the actual state of demacia vs noxus though.

I still think Bandle city, the jungle area's (that don't even have an official name anymore afaik) and several independent champs like soraka.

Well full conext was that because there was a push for more frequent but significantly smaller LUs for 2018 and beyond, I think this creative producer was excited if there was ever the opportunity to revist places in the same year it would be possible now. I dont actually believe anymore there was a planed LU for missed Noxians this year.

And no, no region has objective priority despite how you personally feel. The system practiced for years now is champions that get developed or reworked dictate the type of regional LU. So you need that Yordle conduit to drive the release of Bandle City content, and that relies on the producers of champions to pick up a Yordle character in the first place.

that's still a fucking stupid way to do things. Shurima this shurima that, i'm fucking sick of shurima being responsible for half the damn lore in this game.

we used to get regional stories centered on specific characters, now it seems like it's become "how can we connect this to targon or shurima".
Oh build a bridge...

Tbh I want the continuation of the present Shuriman arc cause they left us in a cliffhanger for 2 years. And Riot if you read this don't make Sivir or Taliah Mary Sues that single handednly carry and ruin the rebuilt Shurima cause of a missunderstanding (Taliah doesn't know what exactly happened when the capital exploded 3000 years ago), make it the battle of demi-gods it should be

Didnt noxus get a fat bunch of lore with the swain release?


Freljord has only gotten a small one with lissandra in her lore update.....and half wasnt even about her.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dmJmKc2j,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-10-20T18:49:27.810+0000)
>
> Didnt noxus get a fat bunch of lore with the swain release?
> 
> 
> Freljord has only gotten a small one with lissandra in her lore update.....and half wasnt even about her.

Well, Frejlord has gotten quite a bit of lore but none of it has been at the mortal level. Nunu and Willump operate as a single unit and give us some insight on the ancient yetis and how important they were for freezing the Watchers under the Howling Abyss. Lissandra got updated but a lot of it is a history lesson and in the modern day she kinda stays north of most of the other Frejlord characters and secretly looks for ways to stop the Watchers from returning. Ornn is another history lesson, and is just barely coming back out into the world so he hasn't had much of an effect on people. Brand's lore just shows how hard life is outside of the major factions of Frejlord. 

There's been lots of Frejlord lore, but the ground level heroes like Ashe, Sejuani, Tryndamere, etc. still really need an update. Frejlord has one of the best historical records in the game (outside of maybe Shurima) but present day is still relatively unknown.
No sense updating it  until the  development team  considers Morde a champion again
What do you mean? We've got plenty of Noxus lore already.
Noxus will probably get some new lore with Morde's VGU if it comes next year. So maybe they're waiting for that?
The same as every region other than Bildgewater and Ionia. Come Riot I want some Demacia and Shadow Isles lore.
I assume theyâ€™ve decided not to continue anything more with Noxus until Mordekaiser is reworked.

DEMACIAAAAAAAAAAA! JUDGEMENT! *An Enemy Has Been Slain*

I think you were going for "JUSTICE!". You made a huge mistake and for that I dunk thee the Noxian way.
